WITH NO BIG CAMERA CREWS FOLLOWING US AROUND, I AM JOINED ONLY BY MY FELLOW INVESTIGATOR NICK GROFF AND OUR EQUIPMENT TECH AARON GOODWIN. THE THREE OF US WILL TRAVEL TO THE SOME OF MOST HIGHLY ACTIVE PARANORMAL LOCATIONS, WHERE WE WILL SPEND AN ENTIRE NIGHT, BEING LOCKED DOWN FROM DUSK UNTIL DAWN. RAW, EXTREME – THESE ARE OUR GHOST ADVENTURES.
